Description: Body sherd of Chian, probably Mature Animal Style, pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of lotus flower and rosette chain in added white outline with added red centres above red and white bands; below, part of two white outlines of a possible floral; exterior surface lost.
Curator's comments: No information can be drawn from the exterior surface, but the elaborate interior decoration is typical of the Mature Animal Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1553) (phase 2)
